name: Abhishek Nehra
about: I am a B.Tech Computer Science student with specialization in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I have a foundational understanding of programming and web development, and I am actively exploring backend development with Flask and Django. Passionate about building useful and accessible tools, I created my first portfolio project to showcase my learning and capabilities.

projects.name: MyPortfolio
projects.desc: A personal portfolio website built with Flask and HTML/CSS to showcase academic and project work.
projects.longdesc: This project is a beginner-friendly personal portfolio site that organizes and displays academic background, skills, achievements, and contact information. It helps present one's profile in a structured and visually appealing way.
projects.technical: The site is built using Flask as a micro-framework for routing and rendering templates. HTML and CSS are used for layout and styling, with basic JavaScript for interactivity. Data is stored in a JSON file and loaded dynamically using Jinja2 templates in Flask.
